001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Inherited;
005import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
006import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
007import java.lang.annotation.Target;
008
009/**
010 * Annotation for defining a framework adapter that configures base packages for test execution.
011 *
012 * <p>This annotation is used to specify the base packages that should be included
013 * when setting up a test context. It is typically applied to custom meta-annotations
014 * that define test execution behavior by integrating different testing extensions.
015 *
016 * <p>The framework automatically detects and processes classes annotated with {@code @FrameworkAdapter}
017 * using reflection, ensuring that the appropriate test setup is applied.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@Target({ElementType.TYPE})
022@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
023@Inherited
024public @interface FrameworkAdapter {
025
026   /**
027    * Specifies the base packages to be included in the test context.
028    *
029    * <p>These packages define the scope of the test adapter and ensure
030    * that the necessary components are scanned and configured for execution.
031    *
032    * @return An array of base package names for the test adapter.
033    */
034   String[] basePackages();
035
036}
